title: Cloud Manifest
description: Define and validate the manifest that drives cloud deployments (VPS first).

requirements.title: Cloud manifest export contract
requirements.description: A deployment-manager export defines target type (vps), scenario id, dependency graph snapshot, bundle inclusions, fixed port overrides, and domain/caddy config.

validation.notes: UI validates a manifest and renders the result.
CLI can post a manifest to /api/v1/manifest/validate.
